name: GravyBoat
0:
”Alexa ask gravy boat for our pancakes recipe”
”Alexa ask gravy boat how many eggs are in pancakes”
”Alexa ask gravy boat to list all my recipes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gravy boat
des: Gravy Boat can read you a recipe or just the ingredients or method. You can also ask for a list of all the available recipes. Or ask how much of an individual ingredient a recipe requires. More recipes will be added soon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
